name: test_e2e_with_logs[474_HHI_CRLF_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_CRLF_002` |
| **Name** | CRLF X-Forwarded-Host injection |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | crlf_host |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nX-Forwarded-Host: evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~7000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:46:10.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=HHI_CRLF_002-1772113570932-p8tbst pattern_id=HHI_CRLF_002 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=HHI_CRLF_002-1772113570932-p8tbst pattern_id=HHI_CRLF_002 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:46:10.000000000: Warning [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=HHI_CRLF_002-1772113570932-p8tbst pattern_id=HHI_CRLF_002 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
